entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö‚Ç∫369,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫55,99 [‚Ç∫55,99 ~ ‚Ç∫369,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö‚Ç∫55,99
  • Pro Tier 1Ôºö‚Ç∫26,99
  • RadarScope Pro SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether you‚Äôre scanning for a mesocyclone‚Äôs tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane‚Äôs eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar‚Äôs scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: ‚Ä¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany ‚Ä¢ 6-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Two built-in providers for radar data ‚Ä¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US ‚Ä¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia ‚Ä¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes ‚Ä¢ Inspector and distance tools ‚Ä¢ Color palette options for radar data ‚Ä¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration ‚Ä¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting ‚Ä¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL ‚Ä¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use ‚Ä¢ Support for widgets and complications ‚Ä¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: ‚Ä¢ 30-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes ‚Ä¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions ‚Ä¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks ‚Ä¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US ‚Ä¢ Local storm reports in the US ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support ‚Ä¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: ‚Ä¢ Everything in Pro Tier One ‚Ä¢ 50-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ A third provider for US radar data ‚Ä¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive ‚Ä¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products ‚Ä¢ NSSL‚Äôs Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products ‚Ä¢ NCEP‚Äôs Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products ‚Ä¢ Surface observations ‚Ä¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US ‚Ä¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA ‚Ä¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices ‚Ä¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: MONOPOLY
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Transylvania Theme BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Explorer PackÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Orient ExpressÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New York 2121 BoardÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Transylvania Theme BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Welcome OfferÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • The Complete CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Golden Flames BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Golden DiceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Theme CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Victorian London BoardÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions ‚Äì no ads, no fuss! Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY 1. Download the official MONOPOLY app 2. Press ‚ÄúPLAY‚Äù 3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token 4. Roll the dice and move around the board 5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it 6. Collect rent when other players land on it 7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed ‚Äì will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 8. If you run out of money, you‚Äôll be bankrupt and out of the game 9. The last player left with a profit wins! FEATURES - MONOPOLY ON THE GO ‚Äì No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! - MULTIPLE MODES ‚Äì Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! - EXCLUSIVE BOARDS ‚Äì Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! - AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE ‚Äì Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game. Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game! The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. ¬© 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫59,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hear My Baby Heartbeat App 2.0
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Trusted by over 500,000 families. The original, best-in-class baby heartbeat app to hear baby heartbeat at home with your iPhone. Looking for a fetal doppler alternative? Hear My Baby uses your iPhone microphone to help you listen to fetal heartbeat sounds ‚Äî not a doppler or a medical device. HMB 2.0 adds AI chat support, tailored tutorials, and pregnancy reveal videos (+ your heartbeat) to help you get results faster. Why parents choose Hear My Baby Heartbeat App 2.0 - Hear your baby‚Äôs heartbeat using the iPhone‚Äôs built-in microphone ‚Äî no accessories required - AI chat support gives step-by-step tips in real time to help you get a result faster - Tailored tutorial adapts to your stage of pregnancy and setup - Create baby sex reveal videos (+ your heartbeat) to share the moment - Record & save heartbeat clips; build a personal timeline you can revisit - Share easily with family and friends (Instagram, WhatsApp, email) - Designed by parents with expertise in sound engineering, AI and app development; warm, honest guidance throughout - Privacy first ‚Äî you control what‚Äôs saved and shared Real 5 Star Reviews "I never leave reviews, let along pay for apps but let‚Äôs just say I tried this , and it def works took me a minute to find babies heartbeat but I found her . And to think I almost spent 40 dollars on a monitor today !" - Lov3r_Gurl IG (USA Sept 2025) ‚ÄúI always find the heartbeat eventually and the rhythm is clear and strong. I love that I can record them to keep.‚Äù - T Lucker (Australia 2025) "I downloaded this very skeptical... It took me about 45 minutes of laying down, very still, with noise canceling headphones on, but I HEARD HIS HEARTBEAT. I am almost 18 weeks pregnant. From one momma to the next, it‚Äôs worth it." - Baby'sHeartbeat (2025) ‚ÄúIt took some time and patience... thank you for creating this cheap, awesome technology to use at home.‚Äù ‚Äî Niki ‚ÄúI was skeptical at first. Great app! Worth it.‚Äù ‚Äî Legretta Hear My Baby uses your iPhone‚Äôs microphone to listen for abdominal sounds; it‚Äôs not a doppler and doesn‚Äôt emit ultrasound. It‚Äôs a lifestyle keepsake for bonding and sharing, not a medical device and not for diagnosis. Results vary with weeks and baby position (many families hear best from 16+ weeks, clearest around ~27 weeks). If you‚Äôre worried at any time in pregnancy, please contact your clinician. For peace of mind, you can use Airplane Mode. How it works (quick start) 1. Find a very quiet room and remove your phone case 2. Place the iPhone microphone on your lower belly and move slowly 3. Our advanced audio engine isolates and amplifies fetal heartbeat sounds so you can listen and save the recording, and trim it to the appropriate moment for sharing quickly and easily. 4. Best from around 16+ weeks; clearest for many families at ~27 weeks. Results vary with baby‚Äôs position and placenta location. Tips for best results - Be still, breathe lightly, and try several positions around your bump - Press the mic firmly against the skin; explore low and to the sides - Bluetooth/over-ear headphones can make subtle sounds easier to hear Important Hear My Baby Heartbeat App is not a medical device and doesn‚Äôt replace prenatal care. If you‚Äôre concerned about anything in your pregnancy, please consult your clinician. Works on iPhone (not iPad). For extra peace of mind, you can switch to Airplane Mode while using the app. Privacy Your moments are yours. You decide what to keep or delete ‚Äî and who gets to hear them. A word from our team... We never see your recordings, but LOVE to hear them so please tag us on Instagram.com/hearmybaby or TikTok.com/hearmybaby or Facebook.com/hearmybaby

entry.title: Goblin Tools
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

This is an app version of the free website goblin.tools, a collection of small, simple, single-task tools, mostly designed to help neurodivergent people with tasks they find overwhelming or difficult. Tools include - A Magic Todo list that automatically breaks down tasks into steps - The Formalizer that transforms your language to be more formal, sociable, concise, or many other options - The Judge that helps with interpreting tone - The Estimator that can guess at a timeframe for an activity - The Compiler to take entire braindumps and turn them into actionable tasks - The Chef, who turns a description of what ingredients and tools you have in your kitchen into a real recipe And many more to come! The website is free and publicly available. Purchases of this app go first towards keeping the site free and ad-free, before supporting the author.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • AccelerationÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • DestructiveÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • ShamanismÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • TotalitarianÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • PantheonÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • AccelerationÔºö‚Ç∫9,99
  • SpiritualismÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

Application Description

Only You Are Here ‚Äî an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.
